Hydras::

"That's a true decepticon, Tylrael"smirked Hydras"If only most of my 
troops be as her and we have ruled Cybertron !!!!"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/7/03 10:13:38 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> Proudwing500k@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Tyrael dodged the shots by flying upward and he threw two feather
> > shards at Maxima and two other at Hydras.
> > 
> > Tyrael: A leader needs vision of both means and goals. Hydras has
> > fused Megatron's deceptiveness with Galvatron's insanity! He 
plays
> > everyone for his own personal advancement. You seem bright; 
you'd do
> > well to step out of the way... That's not what Alpha Trion has 
planned
> > for you anyways, don't you think?
> > 
> > He grinned and waited for her reaction.
> 
> Her crimson optics glowed brightly. Angering her. Then growled 
aloud with a 
> mixed cry from a tiger & hawk an odd screech that was deafening.
> 
> As she aimed at Tyrael once more, dodging one feather, but the 
other hit her 
> arm, inbedding into the left shoulder. 
> 
> Growling in pain, then turning back to Tyrael as she tossed away 
the rifle. 
> Then whipped out 2 energy swords she barely uses. One small like 
the size of a 
> bayonet, the other the size of a cavalry saber. 
> 
> Despite her wounds, she started a charge towards Tyrael, despite 
he was in 
> the air. "Come to face a REAL Decepticon, Tyrael!"
> 
> Pausing, "Alpha Trion does NOT govern MY fate!"
